text: Talia al Ghul is a fictional Batman character who is the daughter of Ra's al Ghul. Ghul might be a villain that wants to either finish her father's work or to avenge his death. She may sometimes help Batman to stop her father's work. She is the mother of Bruce Wayne's son, Damian Wayne. == In other media == Talia has been featured in various media adaptations. The character was voiced by Helen Slater and Olivia Hussey in the DC Animated Universe, which became her first appearances in media other than comic books. Marion Cotillard played Talia in The Dark Knight Rises, but she had a fake name Miranda Tate and was the chairman of Wayne Enterprises. Category:Batman characters Category:DC Comics characters
title: Talia al Ghul
